jobs.company_description: TechSoft is a leading SaaS provider building innovative solutions for the digital age with over 500 enterprise clients worldwide.
jobs.job_description: We're seeking an experienced Frontend Developer to lead our React-based application development team. You'll architect scalable solutions, optimize performance, and mentor junior developers while collaborating closely with UX designers and backend engineers to deliver exceptional user experiences across our product suite.
key_responsibilities: Develop new user-facing features using React and TypeScript
Build reusable components and front-end libraries

jobs.company_description: Fast-growing tech company specializing in cloud-based infrastructure solutions for the financial sector.
jobs.job_description: We're looking for a Backend Engineer to develop and maintain our core API services. You'll work with Node.js and Python to build scalable microservices, optimize database performance, and implement security best practices while collaborating with our DevOps team to ensure high availability.

jobs.company_description: Award-winning mobile app development studio creating innovative iOS and Android applications for Fortune 500 clients.
jobs.job_description: Join our team as an iOS Developer to create beautiful, high-performance applications using Swift and UIKit. You'll collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces, architect new features, and help define best practices for our growing iOS team while staying current with the latest Apple technologies.

jobs.company_description: Enterprise cloud infrastructure provider helping businesses migrate and optimize their workloads in AWS and Azure environments.
jobs.job_description: We need an experienced DevOps Engineer to architect and maintain our CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes clusters, and monitoring systems. You'll automate deployments, optimize cloud costs, and implement security controls while mentoring junior team members and collaborating with development teams to improve reliability.

jobs.company_description: Data science consultancy helping businesses leverage machine learning and advanced analytics to solve complex problems.
jobs.job_description: This entry-level Data Scientist position is perfect for recent graduates looking to apply statistical modeling and machine learning techniques to real-world business problems. You'll work under senior data scientists to clean data, build models, and create visualizations while developing expertise in Python and data engineering best practices.

jobs.company_description: Award-winning hospital serving the community for over 50 years with state-of-the-art facilities and a commitment to patient-centered care.
jobs.job_description: We are looking for a compassionate Registered Nurse to provide high-quality patient care in our cardiology department. You will be responsible for assessing patient conditions, administering treatments, monitoring vital signs, and collaborating with our healthcare team to develop comprehensive care plans for diverse patient needs.
key_responsibilities: Assess patient health problems and needs
Develop and implement nursing care plans

jobs.company_description: Comprehensive rehabilitation center offering physical, occupational, and speech therapy services with multiple locations across the metro area.
jobs.job_description: We're seeking an experienced Physical Therapist to join our team, specializing in orthopedic and sports rehabilitation. You'll evaluate patients, develop treatment plans, and implement therapeutic interventions while mentoring junior staff and contributing to our evidence-based practice standards in a collaborative clinical environment.

jobs.company_description: Full-service medical laboratory providing testing services for hospitals, clinics, and private practices throughout the region.
jobs.job_description: Entry-level position for a Medical Laboratory Technician to perform routine clinical lab tests under supervision. You'll prepare specimens, operate lab equipment, and report results while learning advanced testing procedures in our CAP-accredited facility with opportunities for professional growth and certification.

jobs.company_description: Premier cardiology practice offering comprehensive cardiac care including diagnostic testing, interventional procedures, and rehabilitation services.
jobs.job_description: We're seeking a board-certified Cardiologist to join our growing practice. You'll diagnose and treat patients with cardiovascular conditions, perform diagnostic tests, and develop treatment plans while collaborating with our team of specialists to provide exceptional cardiac care in both outpatient and hospital settings.

jobs.company_description: Pediatric group practice providing compassionate care to children from birth through adolescence with multiple locations across the metro area.
jobs.job_description: We're hiring a Pediatric Nurse Practitioner to provide primary care to pediatric patients. You'll conduct well-child exams, diagnose and treat acute illnesses, provide anticipatory guidance to families, and collaborate with our team of pediatricians to deliver comprehensive care in a supportive clinical environment.

jobs.company_description: Boutique financial services firm specializing in investment analysis and wealth management for high-net-worth individuals and institutional clients.
jobs.job_description: As a Junior Financial Analyst, you will support our investment team by conducting financial research, building models, and analyzing market trends. This role offers excellent growth opportunities for candidates looking to develop their skills in fundamental analysis and financial modeling in a dynamic work environment.
key_responsibilities: Help present findings to senior staff

jobs.company_description: Regional bank providing commercial and personal banking services with a focus on small business lending and community development.
jobs.job_description: We're looking for a Commercial Loan Officer to develop new business relationships and manage a portfolio of commercial loans. You'll analyze financial statements, assess credit risk, and structure loan packages while building relationships with local businesses and helping them achieve their financial goals.

jobs.company_description: Full-service accounting firm providing tax preparation, audit, and consulting services to businesses and individuals.
jobs.job_description: Senior Accountant position available to lead client engagements, review financial statements, and supervise junior staff. You'll prepare complex tax returns, provide strategic tax planning advice, and ensure compliance with accounting standards while developing long-term client relationships and mentoring our accounting team.

jobs.company_description: Middle-market investment bank specializing in M&A advisory, capital raising, and financial restructuring services.
jobs.job_description: Entry-level position for recent graduates to begin a career in investment banking. You'll support deal teams by building financial models, preparing pitch books, conducting industry research, and assisting with due diligence while receiving comprehensive training in corporate finance and transaction execution.

jobs.company_description: Premier wealth management firm providing comprehensive financial planning and investment management services to high-net-worth clients.
jobs.job_description: We're seeking a Wealth Management Advisor to develop and maintain client relationships while providing holistic financial planning services. You'll analyze client financial situations, develop customized plans, and implement investment strategies while coordinating with our team of specialists to deliver exceptional service to our affluent clientele.

jobs.company_description: Progressive private school serving grades 6-12 with innovative STEM programs and a focus on project-based learning.
jobs.job_description: We seek an enthusiastic Math Teacher to join our team, capable of teaching Algebra through Calculus to diverse learners. The ideal candidate will create engaging lesson plans, differentiate instruction, and foster a growth mindset while helping students develop strong problem-solving skills and mathematical reasoning abilities.

jobs.company_description: Nationally accredited preschool providing early childhood education with a play-based curriculum for children ages 2-5.
jobs.job_description: Entry-level Preschool Teacher position available to work with our 3-4 year old classroom. You'll implement developmentally appropriate activities, foster social-emotional growth, and create a nurturing learning environment while collaborating with our teaching team and communicating regularly with parents about their child's progress.

jobs.company_description: Private university known for excellence in STEM education with state-of-the-art facilities and a diverse student population.
jobs.job_description: Tenure-track position for a Computer Science Professor to teach undergraduate and graduate courses, conduct research, and contribute to curriculum development. We're particularly interested in candidates with expertise in artificial intelligence or cybersecurity who can establish a strong research program while mentoring students.

jobs.company_description: Public elementary school with a strong focus on literacy development and differentiated instruction to meet diverse learner needs.
jobs.job_description: Part-time Reading Specialist position to work with struggling readers in grades K-5. You'll assess reading levels, develop intervention plans, and provide small group instruction while collaborating with classroom teachers to implement strategies that support literacy development across all subject areas.

jobs.company_description: Vocational training institute providing career-focused technology education to adult learners through hands-on, project-based courses.
jobs.job_description: We're hiring an IT Instructor to teach our full-stack web development bootcamp. You'll deliver instruction in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks while guiding students through real-world projects and helping them develop professional portfolios to launch their tech careers.

jobs.company_description: Digital design agency specializing in user experience and interface design for startups and established brands across multiple industries.
jobs.job_description: This entry-level UX Designer position is perfect for recent graduates looking to launch their career in user experience design. You'll work alongside senior designers conducting user research, creating wireframes, and helping design intuitive interfaces for web and mobile applications while receiving mentorship from industry professionals.

jobs.company_description: Full-service creative agency specializing in brand identity, packaging design, and marketing collateral for consumer brands.
jobs.job_description: Senior Graphic Designer position leading creative projects from concept through execution. You'll develop visual identities, design packaging systems, and create marketing materials while mentoring junior designers and collaborating with our strategy team to deliver compelling brand experiences that resonate with target audiences.

jobs.company_description: Luxury residential interior design firm creating bespoke living spaces for high-end clients throughout South Florida.
jobs.job_description: Mid-level Interior Designer position to work on luxury residential projects. You'll develop design concepts, create presentations, select furnishings, and oversee installations while collaborating with architects, contractors, and craftsmen to deliver exceptional spaces that reflect each client's unique style and functional needs.

jobs.company_description: Boutique animation studio creating motion graphics and visual effects for advertising, entertainment, and digital media clients.
jobs.job_description: Junior Motion Graphics Designer to create engaging animations for commercials, social media, and entertainment projects. You'll work under senior animators to design and animate graphics while developing your skills in After Effects, Cinema 4D, and other industry-standard tools in a collaborative creative environment.

jobs.company_description: Product design consultancy helping startups and established companies develop innovative physical products and user experiences.
jobs.job_description: We're seeking a Product Designer to lead the design of physical consumer products from concept to production. You'll conduct user research, create prototypes, and work with engineers to refine designs while balancing user needs, business goals, and manufacturing constraints to deliver innovative, manufacturable solutions.

jobs.company_description: Commercial construction firm specializing in mid-to-large scale projects including office buildings, healthcare facilities, and educational institutions.
jobs.job_description: We are hiring an experienced Construction Project Manager to oversee commercial construction projects from planning through completion. You will be responsible for managing budgets, schedules, subcontractors, and quality control while ensuring projects meet all safety regulations and client specifications within established timelines and budgets.

jobs.company_description: Custom home builder specializing in high-end residential properties with a focus on sustainable building practices.
jobs.job_description: Skilled Carpenter needed for custom home construction projects. You'll frame structures, install finishes, and work with various materials while adhering to building codes and project specifications. This position requires expertise in both rough and finish carpentry with opportunities to work on unique, architect-designed homes.

jobs.company_description: Civil engineering firm providing design and consulting services for infrastructure projects including roads, bridges, and water systems.
jobs.job_description: Entry-level Civil Engineer position to assist with the design and planning of civil infrastructure projects. You'll work under licensed engineers to prepare drawings, perform calculations, and conduct site inspections while developing expertise in civil engineering principles and project documentation.

jobs.company_description: Licensed electrical contracting company serving commercial and residential clients with a reputation for quality workmanship.
jobs.job_description: Licensed Master Electrician needed to lead electrical installations and supervise crews on commercial projects. You'll interpret blueprints, ensure code compliance, troubleshoot systems, and mentor apprentice electricians while maintaining the highest standards of safety and quality for our clients.

jobs.company_description: Commercial construction company specializing in steel frame buildings and industrial facilities across the Southwest.
jobs.job_description: Construction Estimator position to prepare accurate bids for commercial construction projects. You'll analyze blueprints, calculate material and labor costs, and develop competitive proposals while collaborating with our project management team to ensure profitable and realistic project estimates.

jobs.company_description: Full-service digital marketing agency helping brands grow through data-driven strategies across paid media, SEO, and content marketing channels.
jobs.job_description: As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will develop and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns for our diverse client portfolio. This role requires expertise in paid social, Google Ads, and analytics to drive measurable results while collaborating with our creative and content teams to deliver cohesive marketing strategies.

jobs.company_description: Leading consumer packaged goods company with a portfolio of well-known food and beverage brands distributed nationally.
jobs.job_description: Senior Brand Manager position to lead all aspects of brand strategy for our flagship product line. You'll develop marketing plans, oversee product innovation, manage budgets, and lead cross-functional teams to drive brand growth while analyzing market trends and consumer insights to inform strategic decisions.

jobs.company_description: Content marketing agency specializing in creating engaging written and visual content for B2B technology clients.
jobs.job_description: Junior Content Writer position to create blog posts, whitepapers, and case studies for our technology clients. You'll research industry topics, interview subject matter experts, and produce compelling content that educates audiences and supports lead generation efforts while developing expertise in content marketing best practices.

jobs.company_description: Boutique social media marketing agency helping lifestyle brands build engaged communities and drive conversions through strategic content.
jobs.job_description: Social Media Manager to develop and execute strategies for our fashion and beauty clients. You'll create content calendars, manage communities, analyze performance data, and stay ahead of platform trends while collaborating with influencers and content creators to amplify brand messaging across social channels.

jobs.company_description: Email marketing technology company providing platform and services to ecommerce brands looking to maximize customer lifetime value.
jobs.job_description: Email Marketing Specialist to design and execute automated email campaigns for our ecommerce clients. You'll segment audiences, A/B test content, analyze performance, and optimize flows to drive conversions while staying current with email marketing best practices and compliance regulations.

jobs.company_description: Business process outsourcing company providing customer support services to leading brands across multiple industries.
jobs.job_description: Entry-level Customer Service Representative to handle inbound customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat. You'll resolve issues, process orders, and provide product information while delivering exceptional service that builds customer loyalty and meets our client's brand standards.

jobs.company_description: IT support services provider offering technical assistance to small and medium businesses through remote and on-site solutions.
jobs.job_description: Technical Support Specialist to provide remote assistance to business clients experiencing IT issues. You'll troubleshoot hardware and software problems, guide users through solutions, and escalate complex issues while documenting cases and maintaining high customer satisfaction scores.

jobs.company_description: National retail chain specializing in consumer electronics with over 200 locations across the United States.
jobs.job_description: Customer Service Manager to lead the front-end operations of our high-volume retail location. You'll oversee cashiers, handle escalated customer issues, implement service standards, and drive customer satisfaction while working closely with store leadership to achieve operational goals.

jobs.company_description: Multilingual call center providing customer support services to clients in the healthcare and financial services industries.
jobs.job_description: Bilingual (English/Spanish) Call Center Representative to handle inbound customer service calls for our healthcare clients. You'll assist customers with billing questions, account updates, and general inquiries while providing compassionate service and accurate information in both languages.

jobs.company_description: Luxury hotel and resort property offering world-class accommodations and amenities on the Las Vegas Strip.
jobs.job_description: Guest Services Manager to oversee front desk operations and ensure exceptional guest experiences at our luxury property. You'll lead a team of agents, handle VIP arrivals, resolve guest concerns, and implement service standards that exceed expectations in a fast-paced hospitality environment.
